English: (TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder `膽~|胆[dan3], stomach `胃~[wei4], large intestine `大腸~|`大~肠[da4 chang2], small intestine `小腸~|`小~肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater `三焦~[san1 jiao1], bladder `膀胱~[pang2 guang1]

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder `膽~|胆[dan3], stomach `胃~[wei4], large intestine `大腸~|`大~肠[da4 chang2], small intestine `小腸~|`小~肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater `三焦~[san1 jiao1], bladder `膀胱~[pang2 guang1]
